generated.css: *{margin:0;padding:0;box-sizing:border-box;font-family:Noto Sans TC,sans-serif;color:#333}* a{text-decoration:none;color:inherit}body{background-color:#ffd370}main{width:100%;height:100vh;display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:space-evenly}main .main-icon{margin-bottom:16px}main .col{display:flex;flex-direction:column;align-items:center;width:37.5%}main .col img{width:100%}main .col h2{font-size:24px;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:24px}main .col .input-set p{font-size:14px;color:#d87355}main .col form .mainpage-btns{margin-top:16px;display:flex;flex-direction:column;width:128px}main .col form .mainpage-btns .mainpage-btns>:first-child{background-color:#333;color:#fff}.hidden{display:none!important}.reverse{flex-direction:column-reverse!important}.reverse>:last-child{background-color:#333!important;color:#fff!important}.reverse>:first-child{background-color:transparent!important;color:#333!important}@media h2{justify-self:center}}.mission-body{position:relative;background-color:transparent}.mission-body:after{z-index:-1;content:"";position:absolute;width:100%;height:100%;left:0;top:0;background:linear-gradient(172.7deg,#ffd370 5.12%,#ffd370 53.33%,#ffd370 53.44%,#fff 53.45%,#fff 94.32%)}header{display:flex;justify-content:space-between;padding:24px 32px 0;margin:0 0 40.55px}header svg{width:242.51px}header h2{font-size:16px;font-weight:400;cursor:pointer}.mission{display:flex;flex-direction:column;justify-content:start;gap:16px}.mission .new-todo{position:relative;width:500px;height:47px;box-shadow:0 0 .toDoList-container{width:500px;display:flex;flex-direction:column;align-items:start;box-shadow:0 0 15px 0 rgba(0,0,0,.1490196078);background-color:#fff;border-radius:10px}.mission .toDoList-container ul{list-style:none}.mission .toDoList-container .category{position:relative;width:100%;margin-bottom:24px}.mission .toDoList-container .category li{color:#9f9a91;width:33.3333333333%;display:flex;justify-content:center;align-items:center;height:51px;border-bottom:2px solid #efefef;cursor:pointer}.mission .toDoList-container .category .category-selected{pointer-events:auto;color:#333;font-weight:700}.mission .toDoList-container .category:after{pointer-events:none;content:" ";position:absolute;width:33.3333333333%;height:100%;top:-2px;background-color:transparent;z-index:10;border-bottom:2px solid #333;transform:translateX(var(--category-position));transition:all .5s ease}.mission .toDoList-container .list{width:100%;padding:0 48px 0 24px;display:flex;flex-direction:column}.mission .toDoList-container .list .toDoList-container .list .mission-card .state-box{width:20px;height:20px;margin:0 16px 0 0}.mission .toDoList-container .list .mission-card .state-box>:nth-child(2){display:none}.mission .toDoList-container .list .mission-card .icon-delete{position:absolute;right:0}.mission .toDoList-container .list .done .state-box>:first-child{display:none}.mission .toDoList-container .list .done
